title: Celebration icons
body: Are they still being handed out? I got the mystery gift skin from Rito but no icon. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: They are still being handed out per our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  It's going to take some time to gift out every eligible account, and you may not get everything all at once.  Hang tight until this is done!
The gifting process was taking longer than expected so they're trying to get every gift out before September 30.
